data.title: HSJ Events
data.meta_description: HSJ Events  | 397 followers on LinkedIn. Inspiring healthcare leaders to deliver effective solutions that improve patient outcomes.
data.text:
Counting down to the #HSJpatientsafety Congress next month! Have you seen the line-up of 120 expert speakers who are joining us? Including Merope Mills Rosie Benneyworth Aidan Fowler Graham Martin THIS Institute (The Healthcare Improvement Studies Institute) Ian Higginson Download the programme to find out more: https://shorturl.at/38itG

We want to take a moment to spotlight our fantastic HSJ Awards 2024 Headline Partner Vodafone Business who are extending their congratulations to this year's finalists. Take a look at their quick video to hear all about what's coming next: https://lnkd.in/eCZwNkfx Anne-Marie Vine-Lott Nivish Mahendrakumar #HSJAwards

We're delighted to have RLDatix as the strategic partner of #HSJpatientsafety Congress. Join their innovation spotlight session at 3.50pm on 16 September to explore the future of #healthcaretechnology & the transformative potential of #AI and machine learning (ML). Find out more: https://shorturl.at/MM5KI

We are delighted to announce the HSJ Awards Shortlist for 2024. Congratulations to all those who have made it to this stage! We want to take a moment to thank our judges for their hard work over the judging month. We also want to thank our headline partner Vodafone Business, our category partners Barnardo's, Department of Health and Social Care, UK Ministry of Defence, NHS England, NHS Professionals, NHS Race & Health Observatory, Tile Hill and our media partners The Association Of Directors of Public Health (UK) and The Health Creation Alliance. Take a look at the list here: https://lnkd.in/ekw4ncyc #HSJAwards

üö® #HSJpatientsafety Summer Sale! Save 20% on tickets for the Congress with code SUMMER20 at the checkout. Limited to the first 20 tickets. Offer ends at 5pm this Friday, 9 Aug. Book now to secure your tickets at the final discounted rate: https://shorturl.at/yd74h

What's the best category for you to enter at the HSJ Partnership Awards? To make the choosing process simpler, we've split our 26 categories into two areas: Excellence in the supply of goods and non-clinical service to the NHS and Excellence in improving health outcomes for NHS patients. Take your time to read through the category criteria - your project may fit in a different category than you first thought. Explore here: https://lnkd.in/eXirgtzh #HSJPartnershipAwards #NHSpartners

We are very pleased to announce the Independent Healthcare Providers Network (IHPN) as a Media Partner for the new HSJ Independent Healthcare Providers Awards. CEO David Hare MBE says: "IHPN are delighted to support HSJ‚Äôs first ever Independent Healthcare Providers Awards. Independent providers play an absolutely pivotal role in delivering accessible, high quality healthcare service to millions of NHS patients every year. These awards are a brilliant opportunity to showcase and celebrate the outstanding care provided by the sector which is helping to improve the health of local communities up and down the country.‚Äù See more here: https://lnkd.in/ed2mcenZ #hsjihpawards
